Meet the

ALEC AI Assist

An AI Powered Virtual Assistant to help Combat Fake News.

Alec AI Assist is a Machine Learning Chatbot that helps you fight against Fake News.Alec AI Assist is an initiative by InTru Innovations all curated in the fight against cyber threats and make a safe digital space by its developer Ayush Anand.

Note: Alec AI Assist is still in Beta. Read the Privacy Notice Here.

     

Now Available on Google Assistant    



RESPONSIVE BY DESIGN, INTELLIGENT BY STYLE



Try the all new intru webapp project straight on your Mobile Phone, Tablet or Laptop seemlessly. Stay on the top of it with the Cloud Sync feature, get the work you left on your Phone to continue to Laptop. Enjoy InTru Anywhere, Anytime, Anyway.

Anytime : With 99.99999..% uptime gaurantee you can find it anytie over the web.
Anywhere : With InTru accessible all over the web (not accessible in areas where free Internet Restrictions apply, e.g. N Koreas, Syria, etc.) and Alec AI Assist over 168 countries globally, you can figure out what a massive network it has.
Anyway : At InTru the user is the king simply beacause we do not steal or sell your data in anyway. There are absolutely no-ads on our platform meaning very high security.

Yes you caught it very right !! Just a tap away and you are in it...
